        public <T> List<T> findAndRemove(io.tarantool.driver.api.conditions.Conditions query,
                                 Class<T> entityType)
        Description copied from interface: TarantoolOperations
        Map the results of a query over a space for the entity class to a List of the specified type. All entities found are returned and removed from the space. Target space will be derived automatically from the entity class. Default value mappers will be used unless a custom one is specified. -- TODO

        public <T> T save(T entity,
                  Class<T> entityClass)
        Description copied from interface: TarantoolOperations
        Save a record into a space. The space is determined automatically by the entity class. If the record doesn't exist, it will be inserted.
        Specified by:
        save in interface TarantoolOperations

        T - target entity type
        Parameters:

      • update

        public <T> List<T> update(io.tarantool.driver.api.conditions.Conditions query,
                          T entity,
                          Class<T> entityClass)
        Description copied from interface: TarantoolOperations
        Update all records selected by the specified conditions. The space is determined automatically by the entity class. Warning: executing this operation on a large data set may cause OutOfMemory error or take significant time to complete.
        Specified by:
        update in interface TarantoolOperations
        Type Parameters:
        T - target entity type
        Parameters:
        query - tuple selection conditions
        entity - entity with new data for update
        entityClass - target class of the result objects
        Returns:
        list of updated objects

        public <T> T call(String functionName,

                  io.tarantool.driver.mappers.ValueConverter<org.msgpack.value.Value,T> entityConverter)
        Description copied from interface: TarantoolOperations
        Call a function defined in Tarantool instance API which returns some MessagePack value as result. The given entity converter will be used for converting the result value into an entity.
        Specified by:

        Type Parameters:
        T - target entity type
        Parameters:
        functionName - callable API function name
        parameters - function parameters
        entityConverter - converter from MessagePack value to the result entity type
        Returns:
        function call result
